reaction.name: Reaction Time
reaction.instruction: Click when the screen turns green

memory.name: Number Memory
memory.description: Test how many digits you can remember

visual.name: Visual Memory
visual.instruction: Remember the positions of the squares

typing.name: Typing Speed
typing.instruction: Type the displayed text as fast as possible

sequence.name: Sequence Memory
sequence.instruction: Click the squares in the order they light up

footer.copyright: © 2025 Brain Mark. Made by Yetong for cognitive testing.

aboutPage.title: About Brain Mark
aboutPage.subtitle: A free, science-based brain training platform
aboutPage.greeting: Hello! I'm the creator of Brain Mark.
aboutPage.introduction: I created this website because I was frustrated with finding high-quality brain training games that were constantly blocked by paywalls and cluttered, tedious website experiences. I believe everyone should have free access to these tools without being stopped by payment barriers.
aboutPage.cognitiveDescription: Designing scientifically effective training programs based on cognitive psychology research
aboutPage.programmingDescription: Building smooth user experiences with modern web technologies
aboutPage.missionDescription: Every game here is backed by science—such as working memory training, attention exercises, and processing speed challenges. I've carefully designed them to be both effective and enjoyable. Whether you're a student looking to improve focus, an adult concerned about memory health, or simply someone interested in brain training, I believe you'll find games that suit you.
aboutPage.gamificationDesc: Transforming boring cognitive training into fun gaming experiences
aboutPage.dataScienceDesc: Record your progress and witness your growth with data
aboutPage.openSourceDesc: All features are permanently free, no ads, no paywalls
aboutPage.visionDescription: I hope these games can help you and that you enjoy them. There's no pressure here—feel free to choose games that interest you and enjoy the process. Even playing for just a few minutes each day is a beneficial mental exercise.
aboutPage.contactDescription: If you have any feedback or suggestions, I'd love to hear from you.
aboutPage.hope: I hope these games can help you and that you enjoy them. There's no pressure here—feel free to choose games that interest you and enjoy the process. Even playing for just a few minutes each day is a beneficial mental exercise.
aboutPage.feedback: If you have any feedback or suggestions, I'd love to hear from you.
